The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 16 right away in the first quarter . The Hawks came out firing in the third quarter though , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 16 right away in the first quarter . The Hawks came out firing in the third quarter though , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 16 to finish the game . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field , while the Magic went just 35 percent from the floor . The Hawks also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 28 - 16 . The Hawks were led by Jeff Teague , who finished with 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , seven assists and two steals . He 's been extremely effective over his last two games , combining for 39 points , 14 rebounds and five assists . It was the first time he 's surpassed the 20 - point mark this season , giving himself a new season - high in points . It was the first time he 's surpassed the 20 - point mark this season , giving himself a new season - high in points . Both Jodie Meeks and Kyle O'Quinn reached double figures off the bench . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 39 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . Kawhi Leonard led the way for San Antonio , scoring a game - high 21 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting from the field and 8 - of - 9 from the free throw line . LaMarcus Aldridge added 16 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting from the field . The Spurs shot just 37 percent from the field as a team . Nikola Vucevic shot 6 - of - 16 from the field on his way to 10 rebounds . Evan Fournier scored 13 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting to go with six turnovers . As a team , the Magic shot just 37 percent from the field as a team .
The New York Knicks ( 5 - 27 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 13 - 17 ) 129 - 135 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Knicks had a strong first half where they out - scored the Kings 50 - 42 , allowing them to coast to a 12 - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who finished with 36 points ( 13 - 29 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , 11 rebounds and six assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points , 6 rebounds and 6 assists per game . Larkin had 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds and five steals , while Collison had 29 points ( 12 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and 10 assists . Rudy Gay had a big game off the bench with 29 points ( 12 - 21 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and a pair of assists off the bench . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Kings will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who tallied 18 points , four rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block while going 5 - for - 13 from the field . Karl-Anthony Towns followed with a 28 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , four blocks and a steal . Zach LaVine followed with 10 points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal . Ricky Rubio rounded things out for the starting five with a stat line of 12 points , five rebounds , eight assists and a block . Nikola Jokic was next with a near double - double of 10 points , five rebounds , eight assists and a pair of blocks . Nikola Jokic was next with a near double - double of 10 points , five rebounds , eight assists and a pair of blocks . Nikola Jokic was next with a near double - double of 10 points , five rebounds , eight assists and a pair of blocks . Nikola Jokic was next with a near double - double of 10 points , five rebounds , eight assists and a pair of blocks . Nikola Jokic was next with 10 points , five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Emmanuel Mudiay rounded out the starting five 's productive night with 15 points , two rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . The Nuggets are currently in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They head to Cleveland to take on the Cavaliers on Monday night .

The Thunder shot much better than the Knicks , going 39 percent from the field and 11 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks finished at 44 percent from the floor and just 11 percent from deep . The Thunder also shot much better than the Knicks , going 39 percent from the field and 11 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went just 39 percent from the floor and a meager 11 percent from deep . The Thunder were led by the duo of Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook . Westbrook went 12 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 32 points , while also adding eight assists and seven rebounds in just 24 minutes . He was very efficient in his time on the court , shooting just 25 percent ( 3 - 12 FG ) from the field in that outing , so it was good to see him get things turned back around and have a very productive showing . Reggie Jackson had a strong showing as well , finishing with 10 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds , four assists and two steals in 29 minutes . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Indiana to play the Pacers on Friday .

As a team , the Pacers shot 60 percent from the field and 57 percent from three - point range , while also holding them to a paltry 57 percent success rate from beyond the arc . The Pacers were led by Greg Monroe 's 16 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , three steals and a block . Andre Drummond posted a 18 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , a steal and a block . Greg Monroe was next with 16 points , nine rebounds , an assist and three steals . George Hill was the only other starter with double - digit scoring , collecting 16 points , nine rebounds , an assist and three steals . The Pistons are currently in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and currently have a hold on the eighth seed in the conference as well . They head to New Orleans to take on the Pelicans on Saturday night . Indiana was led by George Hill , who tallied 20 points , six assists , three rebounds and a steal . C.J . Miles was next with 15 points , three rebounds , an assist and three steals . Ian Miles was held scoreless over 4 minutes , while Ian Mahinmi notably played just four minutes . The Pacers improved to 18 - 32 and remain in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division . They remain home for a showdown with the New York Knicks on Saturday .

The Timberwolves ( 3 - 6 ) were able to pull away in the second half , and were able to pull away in the second half , where they outscored the Timberwolves 37 - 13 in the third quarter . The Lakers ( 3 - 6 ) were led by Julius Randle , who finished with 14 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Lou Williams finished with 17 points , five rebounds and four assists . Andrew Wiggins led the way for Los Angeles , scoring 47 points on 14 - of - 21 shooting from the field . Karl-Anthony Towns added 22 points and 12 rebounds , while Ricky Rubio filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , 10 assists , four rebounds and three steals . Next up for the Timberwolves is a matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday .

Cleveland posted a 60 percent success rate from the field and 63 percent from three - point range , while also limiting them to a paltry 63 percent success rate from behind the arc . Andre Drummond led the way for the Cavs with a modest stat line of eight points , 14 rebounds and one assist . Reggie Jackson followed with a modest six points , five assists , one rebound and one steal . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the bench with 11 points , two rebounds , three assists and one steal . Marcus Morris matched Morris 's point total and added seven boards , an assist and a steal . Ish Smith was productive in a reserve role as well with 12 points , three assists , one rebound and one steal . Richard Jefferson and Richard Jefferson were next with a pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former adding one assist , two rebounds and one steal , and the latter registering eight boards , one assist and two steals . In fact , Toronto pulled out a wire - to - wire win for the Raptors , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . The Raptors won the shooting , rebounding , assisting , assisting , steals , blocks , blocks and turnover differentials . The Raptors ( 0 - 1 ) had to play this game without Chris Paul and it clearly hurt them here . Tobias Harris led the team in scoring , as he tallied 22 points and five rebounds . Marcus Morris was the only other starter in double figures , as he tallied 17 points , nine rebounds and three assists off the bench . Andre Drummond was the only other player in double figures , totaling 16 points and six rebounds . Kyle Lowry flirted with a triple - double off the bench , as he accumulated 10 points , five rebounds and eight assists in the win . Jonas Valanciunas led the team in scoring , as he dropped 32 points and 11 rebounds on 10 - of - 15 shooting and 12 - of - 14 from the free - throw line . Jonas Valanciunas was the only other player in double figures , as he totaled 32 points and 11 rebounds on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Toronto will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup against the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting Utah Jazz 91 - 83 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Friday evening . The Cavaliers ( 45 - 22 ) came into this game winners of five of their last six games , but the Cavaliers ( 43 - 26 ) had no trouble handling the Jazz ( 43 - 26 ) . LeBron James , who returned to the starting lineup after missing two games with a knee injury , led the way with 33 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block in 38 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 10 points and nine rebounds in 20 minutes , while Kyrie Irving finished with 21 points on 8 - of - 19 shooting , 19 rebounds , one assist , two steals and two blocks in 37 minutes . Gordon Hayward finished with 13 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal in 35 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 42 percent from the field , while holding the Jazz to 42 percent shooting from the field . The Jazz continue their road trip Wednesday against the Miami Heat . The Jazz continue their road trip Wednesday in Cleveland .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 16 - 61 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 27 - 50 ) 111 - 116 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Timberwolves had a strong first half where they out - scored the Kings 50 - 38 , allowing them to coast to a 12 - point victory on the road . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who finished with a game - high of 26 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds . Ricky Rubio had a strong showing as well , finishing with 21 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , 11 assists and five rebounds . It was his second double - double over his last four games , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points and 12 rebounds . Kevin Martin also had a strong showing , finishing with 37 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , 11 assists and five rebounds . He 's now combined for 37 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games , as he continues to establish himself as a member of the starting lineup . Kevin Martin also had a solid game off the bench , scoring 37 points ( 13 - 31 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) in just his second NBA regular season game ever . He 's now averaging 20 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists on the year . The Kings were led by Rudy Gay , who scored 33 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 13 - 15 FT ) , along with seven rebounds , five assists and two blocked shots . It was the first time he 's surpassed the 20 - point mark since the beginning of January , so it was good to see him have a better night shooting the ball . Coming off the bench , Omri Casspi went 12 - for - 20 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 31 points , while also adding five rebounds . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

Stephen Curry led the way with 40 points and six assists , while Kevin Durant added 27 points , 13 rebounds , four assists and three blocks .
